item.title: Npc dialog help. quest
item.dc:creator: @whosdr whosdr
item.description:
@whosdr wrote:

i want this not to kick me when i do it, but it does. can somone kinda fix it.

if (NPCID == 579) { if (quest == 1); { sendFrame164(6216); sendFrame126("the bow and arrow sales man sent you eh?", 6217); sendFrame126("well he will have to pay me. i want a yew shortbow.", 6218); NpcDialogueSend = true; quest = 2; if (quest == 2) { if (playerHasItem (857)) { deleteItem(857, GetItemSlot(857), 1); sendFrame164(6218); sendFrame126("thank you.", 6217); NpcDialogueSend = true; quest = 3; if (quest == 3) { if (playerHasItem (2355, 1)) { if (playerHasItem (12, 1)) { if (playerHasItem (3702, 1)) { if (playerHasItem (68, 1)) { deleteItem(2355, GetItemSlot(2355), 1); deleteItem(12, GetItemSlot(12), 1); deleteItem(3702, GetItemSlot(3702), 1); deleteItem(68, GetItemSlot(68), 1); sendFrame164(6219); sendFrame126("there ya go. i will take this furness of you too.", 6217); addItem (8212, 1); NpcDialogueSend = true; sendMessage ("go back to claim your reward"); quest = 4; } } } } } } } } }

Read full topic
